[!exec:git] stop

mkhomedir golden
mkhomedir

exec git init --bare $WORK/dotfiles.git

chezmoi init file://$WORK/dotfiles.git

# create a commit
cp golden/.bashrc $CHEZMOISOURCEDIR/dot_bashrc # FIXME use chezmoi add
chezmoi git add dot_bashrc
chezmoi git commit -- --message 'Add dot_bashrc'
chezmoi git push

# test that updating a file creates and pushes a commit
chezmoi edit $HOME${/}.bashrc
exec git --git-dir=$WORK/dotfiles.git log
stdout 'Update dot_bashrc'

-- home/user/.config/chezmoi/chezmoi.toml --
[git]
    autoPush = true
